name: Babysitting 2
description:
Notable differences from the previous release:

  • Add bunny selection menu.
  • Add a new bunny. Now you can choose between 2 bunnies.
  • Add growth system. Your bunny can now grow into a bigger bunny with brand new animation.
  • Add coin and coin animation.
  • Add "Bunny Time", in which you can get as many points as you can click.
  • Night mode added. Now there is a system to deal with night and day shift and you have to pet your pet to sleep.

Enjoy!
